data.prayer: Father, help your children in Makueni, Kenya find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Makueni, Kenya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Makueni, Kenya need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 438,749 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Makueni.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Makueni, Kenya from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Hadrami people might believe through him.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Makueni, Kenya to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 445,751 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 176 new simple churches in the state of Makueni, Kenya. Place a simple church in every community of the 884,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, move the 438,749 believers in the state of Makueni to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

location.name: Makueni
location.people_groups_list: Gujarati Creole, Ilwana, Orma, Somali Ajuran, Nubian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gujarati Creole (2,100), Ilwana (22,000), Orma (85,000), Somali Ajuran (232,000), Nubian (20,000)
